author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added new constraint 'not' which inverts the result of a sub-constraint.
- Added assert method assertThat() which works with constraint object. This
method allows extended assertions without having to make another method.
This allows mixing assertions like equal and identical with operations which
for instance fetches a property value.
- Reimplemented almost all assert*() methods of PHPUnit2, these new uses the
constraints to the matching and reporting and should give more useful

author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Ustar algorithm supports now filenames up to 255 characters.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - New constraint for checking if an object is an instance of a given class.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added two new constraints 'and' and 'or which allows for building more
